properties.description: See related part of UltraDNS Docs for details about valid values.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: zone
properties.description: (Required) The domain to add the record to

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the record

properties.name: type
properties.description: (Required) The Record Type of the record

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Required) Description of the Traffic Controller pool. Valid values are strings less than 256 characters.

properties.name: rdata
properties.description: (Required) a list of Record Data blocks, one for each member in the pool. Record Data documented below.

properties.name: ttl
properties.description: (Optional) The TTL of the record. Default: 3600.

properties.name: conflict_resolve
properties.description: (Optional) String. Valid: "GEO" or "IP". Default: "GEO".

properties.name: no_response
properties.description: (Optional) a single Record Data block, without any host attribute. Record Data documented below.
Record Data blocks support the following:

properties.name: host
properties.description: (Required in rdata, absent in no_response) IPv4 address or CNAME for the pool member.

properties.name: all_non_configured
properties.description: (Optional) Boolean. Default: false.

properties.name: geo_info
properties.description: (Optional) a single Geo Info block. Geo Info documented below.

properties.name: ip_info
properties.description: (Optional) a single IP Info block. IP Info documented below.
Geo Info blocks support the following:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) String.

properties.name: is_account_level
properties.description: (Optional) Boolean. Default: false.

properties.name: codes
properties.description: (Optional) Set of geo code strings. Shorthand codes are expanded.
IP Info blocks support the following:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) String.

properties.name: is_account_level
properties.description: (Optional) Boolean. Default: false.

properties.name: ips
properties.description: (Optional) Set of IP blocks. IP Info documented below.

IP blocks support the following: - start - (Optional) String. IP Address. Must be paired with end. Conflicts with cidr or address. - end - (Optional) String. IP Address. Must be paired with start. - cidr - (Optional) String. - address - (Optional) String. IP Address.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: zone
properties.description: (Required) The domain of the pool to probe.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the pool to probe.

properties.name: pool_record
properties.description: (optional) IP address or domain. If provided, a record-level probe is created, otherwise a pool-level probe is created.

properties.name: agents
properties.description: (Required) List of locations that will be used for probing. One or more values must be specified. Valid values are "NEW_YORK", "PALO_ALTO", "DALLAS" & "AMSTERDAM".

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: (Required) Number of agents that must agree for a probe state to be changed.

properties.name: http_probe
properties.description: (Required) an HTTP Probe block.

properties.name: interval
properties.description: (Optional) Length of time between probes in minutes. Valid values are "HALF_MINUTE", "ONE_MINUTE", "TWO_MINUTES", "FIVE_MINUTES", "TEN_MINUTES" & "FIFTEEN_MINUTE". Default: "FIVE_MINUTES".
HTTP Probe block - transaction - (Optional) One or more Transaction blocks. - total_limits - (Optional) A Limit block, but with no name attribute.

Transaction block - method - (Required) HTTP method. Valid values are"GET", "POST". - url - (Required) URL to probe. - transmitted_data - (Optional) Data to send to URL. - follow_redirects - (Optional) Whether to follow redirects. - limit - (Required) One or more Limit blocks. Only one limit block may exist for each name.

Limit block - name - (Required) Kind of limit. Valid values are "lossPercent", "total", "average", "run" & "avgRun". - warning - (Optional) Amount to trigger a warning. - critical - (Optional) Amount to trigger a critical. - fail - (Optional) Amount to trigger a failure.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: zone
properties.description: (Required) The domain of the pool to probe.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the pool to probe.

properties.name: pool_record
properties.description: (optional) IP address or domain. If provided, a record-level probe is created, otherwise a pool-level probe is created.

properties.name: agents
properties.description: (Required) List of locations that will be used for probing. One or more values must be specified. Valid values are "NEW_YORK", "PALO_ALTO", "DALLAS" & "AMSTERDAM".

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: (Required) Number of agents that must agree for a probe state to be changed.

properties.name: ping_probe
properties.description: (Required) a Ping Probe block.

properties.name: interval
properties.description: (Optional) Length of time between probes in minutes. Valid values are "HALF_MINUTE", "ONE_MINUTE", "TWO_MINUTES", "FIVE_MINUTES", "TEN_MINUTES" & "FIFTEEN_MINUTE". Default: "FIVE_MINUTES".

Ping Probe block - packets - (Optional) Number of ICMP packets to send. Default 3. - packet_size - (Optional) Size of packets in bytes. Default 56. - limit - (Required) One or more Limit blocks. Only one limit block may exist for each name.

Limit block - name - (Required) Kind of limit. Valid values are "lossPercent", "total", "average", "run" & "avgRun". - warning - (Optional) Amount to trigger a warning. - critical - (Optional) Amount to trigger a critical. - fail - (Optional) Amount to trigger a failure.
See related part of UltraDNS Docs for details about valid values.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: zone
properties.description: (Required) The domain to add the record to

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the record

properties.name: rdata
properties.description: (Required) An array containing the values of the record

properties.name: type
properties.description: (Required) The type of the record

properties.name: ttl
properties.description: (Optional) The TTL of the record
See related part of UltraDNS Docs for details about valid values.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: zone
properties.description: (Required) The domain to add the record to

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the record

properties.name: rdata
properties.description: (Required) a list of rdata blocks, one for each member in the pool. Record Data documented below.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Required) Description of the Traffic Controller pool. Valid values are strings less than 256 characters.

properties.name: ttl
properties.description: (Optional) The TTL of the record. Default: 3600.

properties.name: run_probes
properties.description: (Optional) Boolean to run probes for this pool. Default: true.

properties.name: act_on_probes
properties.description: (Optional) Boolean to enable and disable pool records when probes are run. Default: true.

properties.name: max_to_lb
properties.description: (Optional) Determines the number of records to balance between. Valid values are integers 0

properties.name: backup_record_rdata
properties.description: (Optional) IPv4 address or CNAME for the backup record. Default: nil.

properties.name: backup_record_failover_delay
properties.description: (Optional) Time in minutes that Traffic Controller waits after detecting that the pool record has failed before activating primary records. Valid values are integers 0
Record Data blocks support the following:

properties.name: host
properties.description: (Required) IPv4 address or CNAME for the pool member.

properties.name: failover_delay
properties.description: (Optional) Time in minutes that Traffic Controller waits after detecting that the pool record has failed before activating secondary records. 0 will activate the secondary records immediately. Integer. Range: 0

properties.name: priority
properties.description: (Optional) Indicates the serving preference for this pool record. Valid values are integers 1 or greater. Default: 1.

properties.name: run_probes
properties.description: (Optional) Whether probes are run for this pool record. Boolean. Default: true.

properties.name: state
properties.description: (Optional) Current state of the pool record. String. Must be one of "NORMAL", "ACTIVE", or "INACTIVE". Default: "NORMAL".

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: (Optional) How many probes must agree before the record state is changed. Valid values are integers 1

properties.name: weight
properties.description: (Optional) Traffic load to send to each server in the Traffic Controller pool. Valid values are integers 2
